alerts.description: Lead: AssistNow Temporary Token

Lead: Auto response for webforms (for new website with Drupal, AssistNow). used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead: Auto response for webforms (for new website with Drupal, AssistNow)'

Lead: Auto response for webforms (for new website with Drupal, generic). used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead: Auto response for webforms (for new website with Drupal, generic)' .
Lead: Conversion alert to new Account Owner. When the lead has been converted, send notifitcation to account owner.
Lead: Email Alert Project Information Form. used in flow ''Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead: Notify gsol about new leads'
Lead: Email notification for EMEA office and source as "Project Form - Customer", "NB-IoT Project Form"
Lead: Notify News Subscription. Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead: Notify News Subscription'.
Lead: inform about created Lead action (EMEA, not Project Form - Customer, PCN)
Lead: inform about online shop purchase
Lead: inform about web2lead action (EMEA). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead / project form: send email alert (EMEA)'.
Lead: inform about web2lead action (ANZ). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead / project form: send email alert (ANZ)'.
Lead: inform about web2lead action (Rest of APAC). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead / project form: send email alert (RoA)'.
Lead: inform about web2lead action (Americas). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead / project form: send email alert (Americas)'.
Lead: inform about web2lead action (China). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead / project form: send email alert (China)'.
Lead: inform about web2lead action (Digi-Key).
Lead: inform about web2lead action (India). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead / project form: send email alert (India)'.
Lead: inform about web2lead action (Japan). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead / project form: send email alert (Japan)'.
Lead: inform about web2lead action (Korea). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead / project form: send email alert (Korea)'.
Lead: inform about web2lead action, PCN (APAC). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead: inform about web2lead action, PCN (APAC)'.
Lead: inform about web2lead action, PCN (Americas). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead / PCN subscription: send email alert (Americas)'.
Lead: inform about web2lead action, PCN (EMEA). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead / PCN subscription: send email alert (EMEA)'.
Lead: inform about web2lead action (Taiwan). Used in flow 'Lead: Email Alerts' and the flow node is 'Lead / project form: send email alert (Taiwan)'.

fieldUpdates.description: Add 30 days after the token is generated
fieldUpdates.name: Lead: Add Temporary Token Valid Until

fieldUpdates.description: Copy it to import to Opportunity
fieldUpdates.name: Lead: Copy Application Type

fieldUpdates.description: Fill Company for Leads generated from webform News Subscription where no Company can be given
fieldUpdates.name: Lead: Fill Company

fieldUpdates.formula: "Region: " & NBIOT_Region__c & BR() & "Email of u-blox Contact: " & NBIOT_Email_of_your_u_blox_contact__c & BR() & BR() & "==Project Spec==" & BR() & "1. Prototype Production Date: " & TEXT(Date_Prototype__c) & BR() & "2. Number of Modules required for the Prototype Phase: " & NBIOT_No_of_Modules_for_Prototype__c & BR() & "3. Is there a requirement of performing Laboratory Trials: " & NBIOT_Requirement_of_Lab_Trial__c & BR() & "Date: " & IF(NBIOT_Requirement_of_Lab_Trial__c="Yes",TEXT(NBIOT_Date_Lab_Trial__c),"") & BR() & "4. Are Field Trials planned : " & NBIOT_Field_Trial_Planned__c & BR() & "Date of planned Trials: " & IF(NBIOT_Field_Trial_Planned__c="Yes",TEXT(NBIOT_Date_of_Field_Trial__c),"") & BR() & "Region/City: " & NBIOT_Region_City_of_Field_Trial__c & BR() & "5. In case Field Trials are planned, which Operator(s) are you in contact with?: " & NBIOT_Operator_for_Field_Trial__c & BR() & "6. Start of Production (SOP) : " & TEXT(Date_Production__c) & BR() & "7. Planned Yearly Quantity after SOP: " & TEXT(Annual_Quantity__c) & BR() & "8. Design House reference name: " & Design_House__c & BR() & "9. End Customer reference name: " & End_Customer__c & BR() & "10. Purchasing Account reference name: " & NBIOT_Purchasing_Account_Reference_Name__c & BR() & "11. Current Total Yearly Running Production of devices (meters, etc) : " & Current_Qty__c & BR() & "12. Current Yearly Running Production of devices (meters, etc) with communication unit: " & NBIOT_Current_Qty_w_Communication_Unit__c & BR() & BR() & "==Tech Spec==" & BR() & "13. Frequency bands considered [800MHz, 850MHz, 900Mhz]: " & NBIOT_Freq_Bands_Considered__c & BR() & "14. Detailed description of the end-device application (e.g. metering, telematics, street lighting, environmental monitoring and control, smart parking, ...): " & NBIOT_Detailed_Description_End_Device__c & BR() & "15. Battery part number (indicate battery model name if available): " & NBIOT_Battery_Part_No__c & BR() & "16. Battery cell size requirement [D, C, AA, ...]: " & NBIOT_Battery_Cell_Size_Requirement__c & BR() & "17. Battery capacity [Ah]: " & NBIOT_Battery_Capacity__c & BR() & "18. Expected transmit occasions per day towards the application server (uplink) [number]: " & NBIOT_Exp_Uplink_Transmit_Occasion__c & BR() & "19. Amout of data expected per transmit occasion [bytes]: " & NBIOT_Amount_of_Data_per_Transmit__c & BR() & "20. Device operating temperature range [Â°C]: " & NBIOT_Device_Operation_Temperature_Range__c & BR() & "21. Field FW update procedure required? : " & NBIOT_Field_FW_Update_Procedure_Required__c & BR() & "22. Preferred type of FW update procedure [FOAT, FOTA]: " & NBIOT_Preferred_Type_of_FW_Update__c & BR() & "23. Expected years of operation of the device in the field : " & NBIOT_Exp_Years_of_Operation_in_Field__c & BR() & "24. Which protocol entities does your system architecture normally make use of [pub/sub via COAP or MQTT, TCP, UDP, LWM2M, others]?: " & NBIOT_Protocol_Entities__c & BR() & "25. Interfaces requested [UART, SPI, I2C,...]: " & NBIOT_Interfaces_requested__c & BR() & "26. Nested design with other cellular modules needed? [yes/no]: " & NBIOT_Nested_Design_Needed__c

rules.fullName: Filter spam leads
rules.booleanFilter: 1 and (2 or 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7 or 8 or 9 or 10 or 11 or 12)
rules.description: Automatically set Leads with specific words in email and customer name to status "To be deleted"

rules.fullName: Filter spam leads %28created by web-to-lead%29
rules.description: Automatically set Leads with specific words in email and customer name to status "To be deleted"

rules.fullName: Lead %2F PCN subscription%3A send email alert %28APAC%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team and assigned account managers.

rules.fullName: Lead %2F PCN subscription%3A send email alert %28Americas%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team and assigned account managers.

rules.fullName: Lead %2F PCN subscription%3A send email alert %28EMEA%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team and assigned account managers.

rules.fullName: Lead %2F online shop%3A send email alert %28APAC%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team and assigned account managers.

rules.fullName: Lead %2F project form%3A send email alert %28ANZ%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team .

rules.fullName: Lead %2F project form%3A send email alert %28Americas%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team.

rules.fullName: Lead %2F project form%3A send email alert %28China%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team.

rules.fullName: Lead %2F project form%3A send email alert %28EMEA%29
rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND (3 OR (4 AND 5) OR (4 AND 6) OR (4 AND 8) OR 7) AND 9) OR (10 AND (7 OR 8))
rules.description: When Lead Source is "Project Form - Customer", "NB-IoT Project Form", "Event registration (aloom)" or "Marketing Automation", inform Lead Owner

rules.fullName: Lead %2F project form%3A send email alert %28India%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform Indian country manager and sales admin team .

rules.fullName: Lead %2F project form%3A send email alert %28Japan%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team.

rules.fullName: Lead %2F project form%3A send email alert %28Korea%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team.

rules.fullName: Lead %2F project form%3A send email alert %28M2M Seminar 2013%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead (Road show registration form "M2M Seminar 2013"), inform sales admin team.

rules.fullName: Lead %2F project form%3A send email alert %28RoA%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team .

rules.fullName: Lead %2F project form%3A send email alert %28Taiwan%29
rules.description: When Lead is created via web2lead, inform sales admin team.

rules.fullName: Lead creation%3A set online shop order date
rules.description: When shop orders are imported, set date of shop order to the date of lead creation.

rules.fullName: Lead%3A Auto response for webforms %28AssistNow Temporary%29
rules.description: Sends the email with the temporary token and adds the valid date

rules.fullName: Lead%3A Auto response for webforms %28for new website with Drupal%2C AssistNow%29
rules.description: FOR NEW WEBFORMS: Created as Drupal webforms do not work with Auto-Response Rules of the web-to-lead.

rules.fullName: Lead%3A Auto response for webforms %28for new website with Drupal%2C Contact Us%29
rules.description: FOR NEW WEBFORMS: Created as Drupal webforms do not work with Auto-Response Rules of the web-to-lead.

rules.fullName: Lead%3A Auto response for webforms %28for new website with Drupal%2C generic%29
rules.description: Webform response except Project Information Form - Customer that is sent from Autopilot

rules.fullName: Lead%3A Check Financial News
rules.description: (For News Subscription) Check Financial News based on input given on the webform (Fields Of Interest)

rules.fullName: Lead%3A Check Product News
rules.description: (For News Subscription) Check Product News based on input given on the webform (Fields Of Interest)

rules.fullName: Lead%3A Copy Application Type
rules.description: Copy to import it to Opportunity

rules.fullName: Lead%3A Email Opt Out
Lead%3A New Opp alert APAC
rules.description: To notify the opportunity owner on lead conversion

rules.fullName: Lead%3A Notify gsol about new leads
rules.description: Temporary alert to notify Giovanni Solito and thingstream about new lead. It is for product services requests.

rules.fullName: Lead%3A Project Description for NB-IoT Pro
rules.description: Merge all fields submitted from NB-IoT project form to Project Description

rules.fullName: Lead%3A Set Company and Record Types
rules.description: (For News Subscription) Set Company and Record Types for conversion with the one entered on the web form.

rules.fullName: Lead%3A clear subscriptions when unsubscribing
rules.description: Clears all subscriptions when the lead has unsubscribed.

rules.fullName: Lead%3A embargo countries
rules.description: Reminder that the created record is for embargo countries
rules.formula: OR( Country="CU", Country="BY", Country="IR", Country="KP", Country="SD", Country="SY", Country="UA", Country="AM", Country="AZ", Country="CF", Country="CG", Country="CI", Country="ER", Country="GN", Country="IQ", Country="LB", Country="LR", Country="LY", Country="MM", Country="SO", Country="ZW")

rules.fullName: Lead%3A send email alert to info%40u-blox%2Ecom %28EMEA%29
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND NOT((3 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)) OR 8)
rules.description: When Lead is created on Salesforce or webforms EXCEPT "Project Form - Customer", "PCN subscription", "NB-IoT" or "Marketing Automation", inform sales admin team.

rules.fullName: Lead%3A ub Office as EMEA
rules.description: When lead source is "Project Form - Customer", "NB-IoT Project Form", AND us office is 'EMEA'. then sends the notification email to Crystal

rules.fullName: Remove %27 from fax number
rules.description: remove the '-symbol from the fax number when imported from u-shop

rules.fullName: Remove %27 from phone number
rules.description: remove the '-symbol from the phone number when imported from u-shop

tasks.description: The created record is for one of the embargo countries. Please check the Export Control Guideline provided by Legal (see https://wiki.u-blox.com/bin/view/Generic/LegalHome ).
tasks.subject: New Lead in one of the embargo countries
